objects.description: Most of the strings in ADVSTORESHELL are encrypted with an XOR-based algorithm; some strings are also encrypted with 3DES and reversed. API function names are also reversed, presumably to avoid detection in memory. (Citation: Kaspersky Sofacy) (Citation: Bitdefender APT28 Dec 2015)

external_references.description: Kaspersky Lab's Global Research and Analysis Team. (2015, December 4). Sofacy APT hits high profile targets with updated toolset. Retrieved December 10, 2015.
Bitdefender. (2015, December). APT28 Under the Scope. Retrieved February 23, 2017.
